panels.description: Total number of charging sessions recorded.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT charging_sessions.id) AS "Number of Charges"
FROM charging_sessions
LEFT JOIN charging_sessions_tags ON charging_sessions.id = charging_sessions_tags.charging_sessions_id
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("session_start_date") OR $__timeFilter("session_end_date")) AND
  charging_sessions.vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}

panels.title: Total Charges

panels.description: Total number of battery cycles. A charge cycle happens when you use all of the battery’s power—but that doesn’t necessarily mean in a single charge.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUM(charging_sessions."end_level" - charging_sessions."start_level")/100 AS "Number of Charges"
FROM charging_sessions
LEFT JOIN charging_sessions_tags ON charging_sessions.id = charging_sessions_tags.charging_sessions_id
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("session_start_date") OR $__timeFilter("session_end_date")) AND
  charging_sessions.vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}

panels.title: Total Cycles

panels.description:
Charging locations: Size and color corresponds to energy charged at that station.
Locations are only recorded when provided from the car.
Energy is taken from exact value that was added to the charging sessions or estimated based on SoC if no exact data is available.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "final_latitude" AS "Latitude",
  "final_longitude" AS "Longitude",
  "Charging Station",
  SUM("Amount") AS "Amount"
FROM
  (SELECT DISTINCT
  charging_sessions.id,
  COALESCE(charging_stations.latitude, ROUND(charging_sessions."session_position_latitude"::NUMERIC,3)) AS "final_latitude",
  COALESCE(charging_stations.longitude, ROUND(charging_sessions."session_position_longitude"::NUMERIC,3)) AS "final_longitude",
  COALESCE(charging_stations.name, 'unknown') AS "Charging Station",
  COALESCE("real_charged", COALESCE(("meter_end_kwh" - "meter_start_kwh"), 
  ("end_level" - "start_level") * (capacity / 100::NUMERIC))) AS "Amount"
FROM charging_sessions
LEFT JOIN locations ON charging_sessions.location_uid = locations.uid
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN charging_stations ON charging_sessions."charging_station_uid" = charging_stations.uid
LEFT JOIN charging_sessions_tags ON charging_sessions.id = charging_sessions_tags.charging_sessions_id
LEFT JOIN drives ON vehicles.vin = drives.vin
WHERE
  drives.type = 'ELECTRIC' AND
  COALESCE(charging_stations.latitude, charging_sessions."session_position_latitude") IS NOT NULL AND
  COALESCE(charging_stations.longitude, charging_sessions."session_position_longitude") IS NOT NULL AND
  ($__timeFilter(session_start_date) OR $__timeFilter(plug_connected_date) OR $__timeFilter(plug_locked_date)) AND
  charging_sessions.vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}) AS result
GROUP BY "final_latitude", "final_longitude", "Charging Station"

panels.title: Charge map

panels.description:
Total energy charged.
Energy is taken from exact value that was added to the charging sessions or estimated based on SoC if no exact data is available.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUM("Amount") AS "Amount"
FROM
  (SELECT DISTINCT
       charging_sessions.id,
       COALESCE("real_charged", COALESCE(("meter_end_kwh"-"meter_start_kwh"), 
      ("end_level" - "start_level") * ( capacity / 100::NUMERIC))) AS "Amount"
    FROM charging_sessions
    LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vin = vehicles.vin
    LEFT JOIN charging_sessions_tags ON charging_sessions.id = charging_sessions_tags.charging_sessions_id
    LEFT JOIN drives ON vehicles.vin = drives.vin
    WHERE
      drives.type = 'ELECTRIC' AND
      ($__timeFilter("session_start_date") OR $__timeFilter("session_end_date")) AND
      charging_sessions.vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}) AS result

panels.title: Total Amount

panels.description:
Sum of all charging costs.
Charging costs can be added in each charging session.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUM("real_cost"::NUMERIC/100::NUMERIC) AS "Cost"
FROM
  (SELECT DISTINCT
       charging_sessions.id,
       "real_cost"
    FROM charging_sessions
    LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vin = vehicles.vin
    LEFT JOIN charging_sessions_tags ON charging_sessions.id = charging_sessions_tags.charging_sessions_id
    WHERE
      ($__timeFilter("session_start_date") OR $__timeFilter("session_end_date")) AND
      charging_sessions.vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}) AS result

panels.title: Total Cost

panels.description:
Difference between estimated energy charged from the car and real energy charged.
Value is calculated if charging sessions have real energy charged added.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (SUM("Estimated") - SUM("Amount")) / SUM("Amount") * 100 AS "Delta %"
FROM
  (SELECT DISTINCT
       charging_sessions.id AS id,
       (("end_level" - "start_level") * (capacity / 100::NUMERIC))::NUMERIC AS "Estimated",
    COALESCE("real_charged", ("meter_end_kwh" - "meter_start_kwh"))::NUMERIC AS "Amount"
    FROM charging_sessions
    LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vin = vehicles.vin
    LEFT JOIN charging_sessions_tags ON charging_sessions.id = charging_sessions_tags.charging_sessions_id
    LEFT JOIN drives ON vehicles.vin = drives.vin
    WHERE
      drives.type = 'ELECTRIC' AND
      ($__timeFilter("session_start_date") OR $__timeFilter("session_end_date")) AND
      ("real_charged" IS NOT NULL OR ("meter_end_kwh" IS NOT NULL AND "meter_start_kwh" IS NOT NULL)) AND "end_level" IS NOT NULL AND "start_level" IS NOT NULL AND
      charging_sessions.vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}) AS result

panels.title: Difference estimated/real

panels.description:
Energy added by AC/DC charging sessions.
AC/DC can be automatically detected if provided from the car. If not it is guessed based on charge power. If the charge power is not available AC/DC can be manually set in the charging sessions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "Type",
  SUM("Amount") AS "Amount"
FROM
  (SELECT DISTINCT
     charging_sessions.id, 
     COALESCE(charging_type::TEXT, 'unknown') AS "Type",
     COALESCE("real_charged",
    ("end_level" - "start_level") * (capacity / 100::NUMERIC)) AS "Amount"
  FROM charging_sessions
  LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vin = vehicles.vin
  LEFT JOIN charging_sessions_tags ON charging_sessions.id = charging_sessions_tags.charging_sessions_id
  LEFT JOIN drives ON vehicles.vin = drives.vin
  WHERE
    drives.type = 'ELECTRIC' AND
    ($__timeFilter("session_start_date") OR $__timeFilter("session_end_date")) AND
    charging_sessions.vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw} AND
    ("real_charged" IS NOT NULL OR "end_level" != "start_level")) AS result
GROUP BY "Type"

panels.title: AC/DC

panels.description:
Amount of  Energy loaded above and below 0.8C.
1C corresponds to the power necessary to load the car in 1hour to its full capacity.
Gross battery capacity must be set in the vehicles settings.

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
 '<0.8C' AS "Type",
 EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM SUM("power"*("last_date"-"first_date"+ INTERVAL '1 minute'))) / (SELECT EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM SUM("power"*("last_date"-"first_date"+ INTERVAL '1 minute'))) FROM charging_powers) * 100 AS "Amount"
FROM charging_powers
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_powers.vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN drives ON vehicles.vin = drives.vin
WHERE
  drives.type = 'ELECTRIC' AND
  $__timeFilter("first_date") AND
  charging_powers."power" <= (capacity * 0.8) AND
  charging_powers.vin = '$VIN')
UNION
SELECT
 '>0.8C' AS label,
 EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM SUM("power"*("last_date"-"first_date"+ INTERVAL '1 minute'))) / (SELECT EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM SUM("power"*("last_date"-"first_date"+ INTERVAL '1 minute'))) FROM charging_powers) * 100 AS "Amount"
FROM charging_powers
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_powers.vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN drives ON vehicles.vin = drives.vin
WHERE
  drives.type = 'ELECTRIC' AND
  $__timeFilter("first_date") AND
  charging_powers."power" > ( capacity * 0.8) AND
  charging_powers.vin = '$VIN'

panels.title: Charging Load

panels.description: Distribution of the power used for charging (percentage by time).

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
 width_bucket("power",-1,15,16) AS power,
 ((width_bucket("power",-1,15,16)::decimal-1)) AS "Center of bucket",
 (((width_bucket("power",-1,15,16)-1.5)))::TEXT || 'kW to ' || (((width_bucket("power",-1,15,16)-0.5)))::TEXT || 'kW' AS "Bucket",
 EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM SUM("power"*("last_date"-"first_date"+ INTERVAL '1 minute'))) / (SELECT EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM SUM("power"*("last_date"-"first_date"+ INTERVAL '1 minute'))) FROM charging_powers) * 100 AS "Proportion"
FROM charging_powers
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("first_date") AND
  "power" < 15 AND
  charging_powers.vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY power, "Bucket", "Center of bucket"
ORDER BY 1)

UNION
(SELECT
 width_bucket("power",15,205,19) AS power,
 ((width_bucket("power",-5,205,21)::decimal-1)*(210/21)) AS "Center of bucket",
 (((width_bucket("power",-5,205,21)-1.5)*(210/21)))::TEXT || 'kW to ' || (((width_bucket("power",-5,205,21)-0.5)*(210/21)))::TEXT || 'kW' AS "Bucket",
 SUM("power") / (SELECT SUM("power") FROM charging_powers) * 100 AS "Proportion"
FROM charging_powers
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("first_date") AND
  "power" > 15 AND
  charging_powers.vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY power, "Bucket", "Center of bucket"
ORDER BY 1)
ORDER BY "Center of bucket"

panels.title: Power distribution

panels.description:
Distribution of the charging time over the day.
For meaningful values wait until a significant number of charging sessions were recorded. Change timezone in vehicle settings.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
 EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (("first_date"::timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') AT TIME ZONE COALESCE('UTC', 'UTC'))) AS "Hour",
 (COUNT(*) / CAST( SUM(COUNT(*)) over () as FLOAT) * 100) AS "Proportion",
 ROUND((COUNT(*) / CAST( SUM(COUNT(*)) over () as FLOAT) * 100))::TEXT || '% of charging time' AS "Text"
FROM charging_states
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("first_date") AND
  charging_states."state" = 'CHARGING' AND
  charging_states.vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Hourly distribution in timezone $car_timezone

panels.description:
Charging speeds at different SoC.
For meaningful values wait until a significant number of charging sessions were recorded. Only DC charging sessions are considered.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  battery."currentSOC_pct" AS "SoC",
  MAX(charges."chargePower_kW") AS "Max",
  AVG(charges."chargePower_kW") AS "Avg",
  MIN(charges."chargePower_kW") AS "Min",
  'Metrics calculated from ' || COUNT(charges."chargePower_kW")::TEXT  || ' values' AS "Values"
FROM
  charges
INNER JOIN charging_sessions ON charges."carCapturedTimestamp" > charging_sessions.started AND charges."carCapturedTimestamp" < charging_sessions.ended
INNER JOIN battery ON battery."carCapturedTimestamp" = (SELECT battery."carCapturedTimestamp" FROM battery WHERE battery."carCapturedTimestamp" > charges."carCapturedTimestamp" - interval '120 SECONDS' AND battery."carCapturedTimestamp" < charges."carCapturedTimestamp" + interval '120 SECONDS' ORDER BY ABS(EXTRACT(epoch FROM (battery."carCapturedTimestamp" - charges."carCapturedTimestamp"))) ASC LIMIT 1)
WHERE
    charging_sessions.acdc = 'DC' AND
    charges."chargePower_kW" > 0 AND
    $__timeFilter(charges."carCapturedTimestamp") AND
    charges.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY "SoC"
ORDER by "SoC" ASC

panels.title: DC Charging Speed by SoC

panels.description:
Distribution of the time remaining in a specific SoC.
For meaningful values wait until a significant number ofvalues were recorded.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
 "SoC_pct" AS "SoC",
 EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM "Time") / EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM (SUM("Time") OVER ())) * 100 AS "Proportion",
 ROUND((EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM "Time") / EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM (SUM("Time") OVER ())) * 100)::numeric, 2)::TEXT || '% of time' AS "Text"
FROM
(
SELECT
 "SoC_pct",
 SUM("Duration") AS "Time"
FROM
(SELECT
floor("level" / 5) * 5 AS "SoC_pct",
(last_date - first_date) AS "Duration"
FROM drive_levels
LEFT JOIN drives on drive_levels.id = drives.id
WHERE
  drives.type = 'ELECTRIC' AND
  $__timeFilter("first_date") AND
  drives.vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1) AS data
GROUP BY "SoC_pct") AS data2

panels.title: Distribution of time remaining in SoC

panels.description:
Charging speeds at different battery temperature.
For meaningful values wait until a significant number of charging sessions were recorded. Only DC charging sessions are considered. Only available for selected cars.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  battery_temperature."temperatureHvBatteryMin_K" - 273.15 AS "Battery Temperature",
  MAX(charges."chargePower_kW") AS "Max",
  AVG(charges."chargePower_kW") AS "Avg",
  MIN(charges."chargePower_kW") AS "Min",
  'Metrics calculated from ' || COUNT(charges."chargePower_kW")::TEXT  || ' values' AS "Values"
FROM
  charges
INNER JOIN charging_sessions ON charges."carCapturedTimestamp" > charging_sessions.started AND charges."carCapturedTimestamp" < charging_sessions.ended
INNER JOIN battery_temperature ON battery_temperature."carCapturedTimestamp" = (SELECT battery_temperature."carCapturedTimestamp" FROM battery_temperature WHERE battery_temperature."carCapturedTimestamp" > charges."carCapturedTimestamp" - interval '600 SECONDS' AND battery_temperature."carCapturedTimestamp" < charges."carCapturedTimestamp" + interval '600 SECONDS' ORDER BY ABS(EXTRACT(epoch FROM (battery_temperature."carCapturedTimestamp" - charges."carCapturedTimestamp"))) ASC LIMIT 1)
WHERE
    charging_sessions.acdc = 'DC' AND
    charges."chargePower_kW" > 0 AND
    $__timeFilter(charges."carCapturedTimestamp") AND
    charges.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY "Battery Temperature"
ORDER by "Battery Temperature" ASC

panels.title: DC Charging Speed by Temperature

list.description: Select Car if you have multiple cars in your account
list.label: Car
list.name: VIN

list.description: Timezone selected for the car (UTC if nothing was selected)
list.label: The Cars timezone
list.name: car_timezone
list.query: SELECT COALESCE(timezone, 'UTC') FROM vehicles WHERE vin='$VIN'

list.definition: SELECT tag.name || ': ' || tag.description || '$' || tag.name FROM charging_tag LEFT JOIN tag ON charging_sessions_tags.tags_name = tag.name WHERE use_charges = true
list.label: Show
list.name: tag
list.query: SELECT tag.name || ': ' || tag.description || '$' || tag.name FROM charging_tag LEFT JOIN tag ON charging_sessions_tags.tags_name = tag.name WHERE use_charges = true

list.definition: SELECT CASE WHEN LENGTH($$${tag:raw}$$)>0 AND $$${tag:singlequote}$$ != 'all_values' THEN $$ AND charging_sessions_tags.tags_name IN (${tag:singlequote}) $$ ELSE '' END
list.name: tag_sql
list.query: SELECT CASE WHEN LENGTH($$${tag:raw}$$)>0 AND $$${tag:singlequote}$$ != 'all_values' THEN $$ AND charging_sessions_tags.tags_name IN (${tag:singlequote}) $$ ELSE '' END
